alert.note: Alert for Tillamook (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 05 at 11:41AM PST until December 05 at 10:06PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Oregon... Siletz River at Siletz affecting Lincoln County. Nehalem River near Foss affecting Tillamook and Clatsop Counties. Trask River near Tillamook affecting Tillamook County. For the Nw Oregon / Sw Washington Coast...including Willapa, Naselle, Vernonia, Covered Bridge near Rosburg, Foss, Tillamook, Tillamook, Beaver, Siletz, Tidewater, Mapleton...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Trask River near Tillamook. * WHEN...From this afternoon to late this evening. * IMPACTS...Above 16.5 feet, expect minor flooding along the lower Trask River. Dairy farms, buildings, and a few residences adjacent to the Trask in the vicinity of Hwy 101 may be threatened. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM PST Tuesday the stage was 15.0 feet. - Bankfull stage is 15.0 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage to 16.6 feet late this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage this evening. - Flood stage is 16.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 745 PM PST.
